title: The Pender County State Boat Ramp has been finished off of Sloop Point Road for two months.  But...has yet to open.  WHY?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20120405/ARTICLES/120409811 Also, we'll have a reporter updating that story again soon. Watch for the story in the StarNews.
